name: Salvation (Soxar)
description:
Created for XPrize Connect’s Code Games competition (Summer 2020)

Salvation takes place in a future where human civilization has fallen. As a robot, the player awakens in a mysterious lab with their last objective being to "save humanity". To accomplish this, the player will have to explore the last remaining city, Imperalis,  and fight through other robots using Terraria-like combat. Collect new weapons and upgrades, discover the city's secrets, and decide the fate of humanity.

This was a solo project used to self-learn Unity from zero game dev experience.
